campPage.establishment: Center for spiritual and physical development
campPage.aboutUsText: For many years, our center has been a place of God's work on the hearts of children, adolescents and young people. In addition to working with children of religious parents, there is also active work among orphans and children from nearby rural schools.
campPage.aboutUsText2: Our goal is first of all to help children know God, to teach them to communicate with Him. And also to spend time in pleasant communication and interesting activities in nature.
campPage.history: For many years we have leased areas for our camps. Thank God, in 2019 we were able to buy territory for our center - an old Soviet camp near the city of Zhytomyr.
campPage.buildingHistory: Since the camp was in poor condition, we began a general reconstruction. However, we need your financial support.

tabernacle.title: Tabernacle Tent
tabernacle.description: The centerpiece of every Christian camp is the room where services are held. Therefore, the construction of a meeting tent, which we called the biblical name «Tabernacle», was a priority in our plans. The Tabernacle is now partly built, and we have had the opportunity to hold various events there, including youth conferences and region meetings for ministers.
tabernacle.requestIntro: However, we need additional funds to complete the construction of the Tabernacle:

requests.tents: awnings on walls from bad weather

diningBuilding.title: Dining building
diningBuilding.description: was left from the time of the former Soviet camp, had not been used for more than 15 years and required major repairs. Therefore, some internal work was done so that this room could be used for its intended purpose. However, there is still a lot of construction work to be done to bring the dining room to its proper condition.
